remarks: Apply a group homomorphism to a group sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) Obsolete version of ~ gsummhm as of 6-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsummhmOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsummhmOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsummhmOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsummhmOLD.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. Mnd ) $.
gsummhmOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsummhmOLD.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( G MndHom H ) ) $.
gsummhmOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsummhmOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsummhmOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( H gsum ( K o. F ) ) = ( K ` ( G gsum F ) ) ) $.
